execution_plan.description: Count active products in the store_main database (products where is_active = true).
execution_plan.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_product_count FROM products WHERE is_active = true;

execution_plan.description: Count active items in the store_alt database (items where active = 'Y').
execution_plan.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_item_count FROM items WHERE active = 'Y';
